LanguageData.PA.WonFreedom: {0} has won their freedom and will try to leave this place as soon as possible.
LanguageData.PA.NoSpot: Could not find a suitable spot for releasing the prisoner
LanguageData.PA.NoWarden: Not a warden in sight to give the winner their freedom, you need someone capable of releasing prisoners
LanguageData.PA.NoWardenToFight: Not a lad to bring the poor guy to the arena, you need someone capable of watching prisoners
LanguageData.PA.SelectDifferent: Fighter can't be fighting themselves, select two different ones
